profileText: a Representative from Texas; born in Pittsfield, Berkshire County, Mass., December 19, 1967; graduated from Pittsfield High School, Pittsfield, Mass., 1986; attended the University of Massachusetts, Amherst, Mass.; B.A., University of Notre Dame, Notre Dame, Ind., 1990; United States Air Force, 1990-1994; entrepreneur; business executive; member of the Frisco, Tex., city council, 2009-2012, mayor pro tem, 2011-2012; Member of the Texas state house of representatives, 2013-2019; member of the Texas state senate, 2019-2021; Delegate, Republican National Convention, 2016; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Seventeenth and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2021-present).
